IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: TO AWARD SCHOLARSHIPS TO STUDENTS ATTENDING REND LAKE COLLEGE AND TO ENHANCE THE CULTURAL CONTRIBUTIONS OF THE COLLEGE TO STUDENTS AND AREA RESIDENTS.
IRS990.MissionDescription: TO AWARD SCHOLARSHIPS TO STUDENTS ATTENDING REND LAKE COLLEGE AND TO ENHANCE THE CULTURAL CONTRIBUTIONS OF THE COLLEGE TO STUDENTS AND AREA RESIDENTS.
IRS990.Description: THE AWARDING OF SCHOLARSHIPS TO INDIVIDUAL STUDENTS BASED ON APPLICATION AND NEED.

Activity2.Description: THE DONATION OF FUNDS TO REND LAKE COLLEGE TO ENHANCE THE CULTURAL CONTRIBUTIONS OF THE COLLEGE AND DONATIONS TO ORGANIZATIONS IN THE COMMUNITY.

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.ReturnReference: Description of Intended Use of Endowment Funds:
Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: TO AWARD SCHOLARSHIPS TO STUDENTS ATTENDING REND LAKE COLLEGE.

RecipientTable.DescriptionOfNonCashAssistance: 10 HOSPITAL BED SETS, CONTINOUS MINING MACHINE, SEMI TRUCK, MISC SUPPLIES
RecipientTable.PurposeOfGrant: TO ENHANCE THE EDUCATIONAL AND CULTURAL CONTRIBUTIONS OF THE COLLEGE. THE NON-CASH CONTRIBUTIONS ARE FOR DIFFERENT EDUCATIONAL TRAINING PROGRAMS.

Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Identifier: Procedure for Monitoring Grants in the U.S.:
Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Explanation: Schedule I, Part I, Line 2: THE SCHOLARSHIPS ARE PAID DIRECTLY TO REND LAKE COLLEGE FOR STUDENT TUITION AND EDUCATIONAL EXPENSES. AMOUNTS PAID DIRECTLY TO INDIVIDUALS ARE MONITORED BY THE INSTITUTION'S INSTRUCTORS TO ENSURE THAT MONIES ARE USED AS DIRECTED.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE RETURN WAS AVAILABLE TO THE BOARD MEMBERS AND REVIEWED IN DETAIL BY THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR PRIOR TO FILING.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 12c
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE FOUNDATION HAS A CONFLICT OF INTEREST STATEMENT WHICH IS COMPLETED BY OFFICERS, DIRECTORS OR TRUSTEES, AND KEY EMPLOYEES IN A TIMELY MANNER AND UPDATED ANNUALLY.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 15a
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE FOUNDATION REIMBURSES REND LAKE COLLEGE FOR THE SALARY OF THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR OF THE FOUNDATION. THE SALARY OF THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR IS DETERMINED BY THE EMPLOYMENT COMMITTEE OF THE COLLEGE AND IS FURTHER APPROVED BY THE BOARD OF THE COLLEGE AND THE FOUNDATION.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, line 19
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE ORGANIZATION MAKES ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.
THE PROCESS FOR OVERSEEING THE AUDIT PROCESS AND SELECTING AN INDEPENDENT AUDITOR HAS NOT CHANGED FROM THE PRIOR YEAR.
